name: Elixir Bloody Mary
ingredients: Old Bay Seasoning; Square One Organic vodka; Dried dill; Ground white pepper; Celery salt; Worcestershire sauce; Tabasco Sauce; Elixir Juice (a mixture of olive brine, dill pickle brine and various other pickle brines); Lemon wedge's juice; Prepared horseradish; Tomato juice
description: Coat the rim of a pint glass with Old Bay Seasoning. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake lightly�-you want to mix the ingredients without melting too much of the ice�-and pour (unstrained) into the prepared glass. Garnish with a kosher dill pickle spear and a cooked slice of thick-cut bacon. Don't use a straw; drink from the rim in order to get a little of the Old Bay with each sip.

name: Tequila Furnace
ingredients: El Tesoro Platinum Tequila; Tabasco Sauce; Salt; Lime wedge
description: Pour the tequila into a tall shot glass. Add a few drops of Tabasco Sauce and stir gently. Lick some salt off your hand, drink the tequila and then bite the lime wedge.

name: Flaming Dr. Pepper Shot
ingredients: Beer; Amaretto; Rum
description: Fill a pint glass halfway with beer. Add the amaretto to a shot glass and top with the rum. Set the rum on fire and very carefully drop the shot glass into the beer.This is one drink best to order in a bar and not make at home.

name: Don Julio’s Bloody Maria
ingredients: Lemon wedge; Ground black pepper; Don Julio Reposado Tequila; Tabasco Hot Pepper Sauce; Worcestershire sauce; Celery salt; Ground horseradish; Lime juice; Tomato juice
description: Rub the lemon wedge along the rim of a highball glass and discard. Coat the rim with black pepper. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Stir, and garnish with another lemon wedge and skewered cherry tomatoes.

name: Basil Hayden's Bloody Mary
ingredients: Lime wedge; Celery salt; Basil Haydens Bourbon; Hot sauce; Worcestershire sauce; Wasabi; Tomato juice
description: Rub the lime wedge around the rim of a pint glass and coat with celery salt. Fill with ice and add 2 dashes of celery salt and the remaining ingredients except the tomato juice. Fill with tomato juice and stir well. Garnish with a celery stalk, lime wedge and blue cheese-stuffed olives.

name: Patrón Perfect Cosmo
ingredients: Patrón Silver Tequila; Patrón Citrónge Orange Liqueur; Cranberry juice; Fresh lime juice
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Sparkler
ingredients: Don Julio blanco tequila; Simple syrup; Champagne
description: Add all the ingredients to a Champagne flute. Garnish with a strawberry slice.

name: Bloody Roman
ingredients: Castelvetrano or other mild green olives; Beer (preferably Anchor Steam), cold; Roman Mix; Oysters (preferably Kumamato or Kusshi), shucked, liquor reserved
description: Place 2 olives in each of 6 pint glasses. Pour half a bottle of beer into each glass and top with the Roman Mix, divided evenly among the glasses. Place 2 shucked oysters with their liquor in each glass and garnish with an additional olive, a serrano chile and a few chile threads.

name: No. 3 Gin Martini
ingredients: No. 3 London Dry Gin, frozen; Dry vermouth; Orange bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Royal Balmoral Punch
ingredients: Glenfiddich 21-Year-Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky; Tea Syrup; Granny Smith apple juice; Lemonade; Champagne; Thistle
description: Add the Scotch, syrup and apple juice to a teacup and add a large ice cube. Top with equal amounts of lemonade and Champagne. Garnish with a lemon wheel and thistle. (This recipe can multiplied to serve a crowd: Mix in a punch bowl with a large block of ice.).

name: Hendrick’s Hot Gin Punch
ingredients: Hendrick\'s Gin; Madeira wine; Lemon twists; Orange slice; pineapple; Honey; Fresh lemon juice; Cloves; Ground nutmeg; Ground cinnamon; Brown sugar
description: Add all the ingredients to a large saucepan and simmer over low heat for about 20 minutes. To serve, pour the hot mixture into a punch bowl or teapot and garnish with orange slices studded with cloves. Pair with gingerbread.

name: Martha Washington Punch
ingredients: Flor de Caña 4-Year-Old Gold Rum; Appleton Estate Extra 12-Year-Old Rum; Grand Marnier; Fresh lemon juice; Fresh orange juice; Spiced simple syrup*; Club soda
description: Add all the ingredients except the club soda to a pitcher or other container and stir to combine. Refrigerate until cold. Place a large ice block into a punch bowl (or fill halfway with large ice cubes). Add the prepared mixture and the club soda, and stir. Garnish with lemon and orange half-wheels and grated nutmeg.

name: Cardamom & Pop Punch
ingredients: Sugar cubes; Club soda, divided; Green cardamom pods; Flor de Caña 7-Year-Old Grand Reserve Rum; Lime juice; Grapefruit juice; Regans Orange Bitters No. 6
description: In a shaker, dissolve the sugar cubes in 1 ounce of the club soda. Add the cardamom and muddle. Add the rum, lime juice, grapefruit juice and bitters, one at a time, while stirring. Fill with ice and stir. Strain into a cocktail or punch glass and top with the remaining 2 ounces of club soda. Garnish with lime wheels.

name: Fish House Punch
ingredients: Lemons; Demerara sugar; Boiling water; Lemon juice; Smith & Cross Traditional Jamaica Rum (or other strong, pungent Jamaican ); VSOP cognac; Real peach brandy; Cold Water (96 oz)
description: At least a day ahead, fill a 2-quart bowl with water and freeze until completely solid. In a large punch bowl, muddle the lemon peels and sugar. Let the mixture stand for at least 3 hours. Add the boiling water, stirring until as much as possible of the sugar has dissolved. Add the remaining ingredients and stir to combine. To serve, add the ice block and garnish liberally with freshly grated nutmeg. This recipe serves 25.

name: Negroni Sbagliato
ingredients: Sweet vermouth; Campari liqueur; Assorted seasonal fruit; Prosecco
description: Add the vermouth and liqueur to a punch bowl and add large ice cubes or a large ice block. Add the fruit and top with the prosecco. Stir gently and garnish with freshly grated cinnamon.

name: Timmy's Brandy Milk Punch
ingredients: Brandy; Milk; Powdered sugar, plus more to taste; Vanilla extract; Grated nutmeg, to taste
description: Add all the ingredients to a blender and fill with ice. Blend for 20 seconds. Taste, and add more sugar if desired. Strain the mixture into four tall glasses filled with crushed ice.

name: Pisco Punch
ingredients: BarSol Primero Pisco; Dole Pineapple Juice; Fresh lime juice; Simple syrup
description: Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a white wine glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with pineapple chunks and a cherry.

name: Jack-o-Lantern Punch
ingredients: Sugar cubes; Whole cloves; Club soda, divided; Flor de Caña 7-Year-Old Grand Reserve Rum; fresh-ground nutmeg; Lemon juice; Apple juice
description: In a mixing glass, muddle the sugar cubes, cloves and 1 ounce of the soda until the sugar dissolves. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a punch cup. Top with the remaining 2 ounces of club soda and garnish with apple slices, cinnamon sticks and pumpkin seeds. (You can also multiply this recipe, stir and strain into a punch bowl. Top each individual portion with club soda when serving).

name: Green Beast
ingredients: Pernod absinthe; Fresh lime juice; Simple syrup; Water
description: Add all the ingredients to a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with cucumber slices and stir. (This recipe can be multiplied to fill a large punch bowl.).

name: Employees Only Manhattan
ingredients: Rye whiskey; Sweet vermouth; Grand Marnier; Angostura bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Zacapa Perfect Manhattan
ingredients: Zacapa 23 Rum; Dry vermouth; Sweet vermouth; dashes Bitters; Honey syrup (one part honey, one part water)
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Brown Derby
ingredients: Bourbon; Fresh grapefruit juice; Honey syrup*
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a grapefruit wedge or twist.

name: Jockey Club
ingredients: Bourbon; Sweet vermouth; Maraschino liqueur
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a brandied cherry on a cocktail pick.

name: Bourbon Lift
ingredients: Maker's Mark Bourbon; Heavy cream; House Spirits Coffee Liqueur or other coffee liqueur; Almond orgeat (bottled or homemade); Club soda
description: Add all the ingredients except the club soda to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake for 10 seconds and double-strain into an 8-ounce Fizz or Collins glass. Fill with club soda, pouring from about 6 inches above the glass. Wait a few seconds and then add another splash of soda�-this will �"lift�" the foam above the top of the glass. Serve with a straw.

name: Whiskey Sour
ingredients: Bourbon; Fresh lemon juice; Simple syrup (1 part water, 1 part sugar); Cherry
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker filled with ice and shake. Strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a cherry and lemon wedge.

name: Bourbon Manhattan
ingredients: Bourbon; Italian sweet vermouth; Angostura bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry. (If you prefer a dry Manhattan, use dry vermouth instead of sweet and garnish with a lemon twist.).

name: Perfect Pearl Manhattan
ingredients: Lagavulin 16-Year-Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky; Bulleit bourbon; Dolin Rouge vermouth; Dolin dry vermouth; Regans Orange Bitters No. 6
description: Rinse a cocktail glass with the Scotch and set aside. Add the remaining ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir until chilled and strain into the prepared glass.

name: Manhattan
ingredients: Bourbon; Italian sweet vermouth (Carpano Antica Formula); Bitters  (Fee Brothers Whiskey Barrel Aged Bitters)
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir until exceedingly well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Scofflaw
ingredients: Bourbon or rye whiskey; Dry vermouth; Lemon juice; Grenadine; Orange bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Pimm's Cup
ingredients: Pimm's No. 1; Sprite, 7Up or ginger ale; Cucumber Slices; Strawberry, hulled and cut into quarters; Orange slice; Lemon slice; Mint leaves
description: To make a Pimm's cup, first add all the ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice and stir to combine. (To mix things up a bit, you can replace the Sprite, 7Up or ginger ale with Champagne.).

name: Bulleit Perfect Manhattan
ingredients: Bulleit Rye Whiskey; Dry vermouth; Sweet vermouth; Stirrings Blood Orange Bitters
description: Add the rye and both vermouths to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Top with the bitters and garnish with a Maraschino cherry.

name: Mint Julep
ingredients: Raw sugar syrup; Mint leaves; Bourbon
description: In a Julep cup or rocks glass, lightly muddle the mint and syrup. Add the bourbon and pack tightly with crushed ice. Stir until the cup is frosted on the outside. Top with more crushed ice to form an ice dome and garnish with a few drops of bitters, if desired, and a mint sprig.

name: Mount Gay Rum Punch
ingredients: Mount Gay Eclipse Rum; Water; Grenadine; Simple syrup; Lime juice; Angostura bitters; Freshly grated nutmeg
description: Add all the ingredients to a punch bowl and stir to combine. Let stand for 2 hours and serve in punch cups filled with ice. Garnish each cup with a cherry.

name: The Manhattan 101
ingredients: Wild Turkey Bourbon; Dry vermouth; Sweet vermouth; Fresh ginger; Mint leaves; Powdered sugar; Aromatic bitters
description: Muddle the ginger, mint, powdered sugar and bitters in a cocktail shaker. Add the Wild Turkey Bourbon, both vermouths and ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: New York Sour
ingredients: Rye whiskey or bourbon; Lemon juice; Simple syrup; Red wine
description: Add all the ingredients except the wine to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Slowly pour the wine over the back of a spoon so that it floats on top of the drink.

name: Brazilian Sangria
ingredients: Fresh seasonal fruit (recommended: strawberry, lime, orange, kiwi and passion fruit); Lucid absinthe; Cachaca; Spanish brandy; Orange liqueur; Red wine
description: In a shaker, thoroughly muddle the fruit with the absinthe, cachaça, brandy and orange liqueur. Pour into a wine glass. Float the red wine on top and stir briefly.

name: Whiskey Smash
ingredients: Lemon, cut into wedges; Mint leaves; Simple syrup; Elijah Craig 12-Year-Old Bourbon
description: In a shaker, muddle the lemon. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake, and double-strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice or one large ice chunk. Slap a mint sprig between your hands and use as garnish. Serve with a straw.

name: Hot Toddy
ingredients: Boiling water, to fill a mug; Cloves; Lemon twist; Demerara sugar or brown sugar; Fresh lemon juice; Bourbon, rye whiskey, Irish whiskey or scotch
description: Fill a mug with boiling water and let stand for a minute or two to warm. Meanwhile, stick the cloves into the lemon twist and set aside. Empty the mug and fill about halfway with fresh boiling water. Add the sugar and stir to dissolve. Add the prepared lemon twist and stir. Add the lemon juice and whiskey, and stir again.

name: Bourbon Old Fashioned
ingredients: Angostura bitters; Sugar; Orange wheel; Maraschino cherry; Club soda; Bourbon
description: In an Old Fashioned glass, muddle the bitters, sugar, orange wheel, cherry and a splash of soda. Remove the orange rind, add the bourbon and fill with ice. Garnish with a fresh orange wheel and cherry.

name: Boston Rum Punch
ingredients: Smith & Cross Traditional Jamaica Rum; Lemonade
description: Fill a shaker with finely cracked ice. Add the rum and fill with lemonade. Shake briefly and pour (unstrained) into a pint glass. Add a straw and garnish with either freshly grated nutmeg or half a strawberry and an orange slice.

name: Maker's Mark Collins
ingredients: Maker's Mark Bourbon; Lemon juice; Sugar; Club soda
description: Add the bourbon, lemon juice and sugar to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice. Top with club soda and garnish with an orange wheel and a maraschino cherry.

name: Blood Orange Margarita
ingredients: Salt; Blanco tequila; Combier triple sec orange liqueur; Campari; Blood orange juice; Lime juice; Simple syrup
description: Coat the rim of a rocks glass with salt, fill with ice and set aside. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with fresh ice. Shake, and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a blood orange slice.

name: Off to the Races
ingredients: Shiso leaves; Buffalo Trace Bourbon; Peach-Apricot-Chipotle Chile Agave Nectar; Fresh lemon juice; Peach bitters
description: In a shaker, muddle the shiso leaves. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake well and double-strain into a double Old Fashioned glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a shiso leaf.

name: Brazilian
ingredients: Van Gogh açaí-blueberry vodka; Lemonade
description: Add Van Gogh Açai-Blueberry Vodka and lemonade to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Bourbon Rickey
ingredients: Bourbon; Lime; Club soda
description: Fill a highball glass with cracked ice. Squeeze the lime half into the glass and drop it in. Add the bourbon and fill with club soda. Stir briefly to combine.

name: Cognac Mint Julep
ingredients: Mint; Sugar; Rémy Martin 1738 Accord Royal Cognac
description: In a shaker, muddle the mint, sugar and a dash of water. Add the cognac and fill with shaved ice. Shake until frosted and pour (unstrained) into a rocks glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: 1792 Kentucky White Dog Julep
ingredients: Sugar; Water; Mint leaves; Unaged corn or rye whiskey
description: Add the sugar and water to a highball glass and stir until the sugar has completely dissolved. Add the mint leaves and press lightly with a muddler. Pack the glass with finely cracked ice (wrap cubes in a towel and bash the bejeezus out of them with something hard and heavy) and then add the whiskey. Stir, add more ice to make up for any shrinkage and garnish with two or three sprigs of mint and a straw.

name: Añejo Old Fashioned
ingredients: Agave nectar; Angostura bitters; Orange peel; Partida Añejo Tequila
description: In an Old Fashioned glass, lightly muddle the agave nectar, bitters and orange peel. Fill with ice and add the tequila. Stir, and garnish with a brandied cherry.

name: Fresh Watermelon Margarita
ingredients: Seedless watermelon, cut into 1-inch cubes; Agave syrup  (1 part agave nectar, 1 part water); Don Julio blanco tequila; Fresh lime juice
description: Muddle the watermelon and agave syrup in a shaker. Add the remaining ingredients and ice and shake. Double-strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a watermelon slice.

name: Boat House Punch
ingredients: Dorothy Parker American Gin; Sugar; Lemon; Aperol; St-Germain; Lemon juice; Orange juice; Grapefruit juice; Rosé Champagne (6 oz)
description: In a large pitcher, muddle the lemon peel and sugar. Let stand for at least 30 minutes. Add the remaining ingredients, fill with ice and stir briefly. Garnish with orange wheels.

name: Uncle Angelo’s Eggnog
ingredients: Eggs, separated; Sugar; Whole milk; Heavy cream; Bourbon (Four Roses); Spiced rum (Captain Morgan or Sailor Jerry)
description: In a large bowl, beat together the egg yolks and half a cup of sugar until they turn light in color. Stir in the milk, heavy cream, bourbon and rum. In a separate bowl, beat the egg whites with the remaining quarter-cup of sugar until they form soft peaks. Fold about a third of the egg whites into the yolk mixture. Serve in punch or tea cups topped with freshly grated nutmeg, folding in more of the egg whites as desired.

name: Wild Turkey Mint Tea
ingredients: Water, divided; Sugar; Black tea bags; Fresh mint leaves; Wild Turkey Bourbon; Juice of half a lemon; Juice of half a lime
description: In a large saucepan, boil 2 cups of water and the sugar. Remove from the heat and add the tea bags. Steep for 8 minutes and then discard the bags. Add the remaining 2 cups of water. Transfer to a pitcher and chill. Add the mint and crush with a wooden spoon until fragrant. Stir in the remaining ingredients. Serve in tall glasses filled with ice. Garnish each glass with a mint sprig.

name: Canadian Punch
ingredients: Rye whiskey; Smith & Cross Traditional Jamaica Rum; Lemons, sliced thinly; Pineapple, peeled, cored and cut into half-inch rings; Sugar; Water; Quart-sized ice block (fill a quart bowl with water and freeze overnight); Nutmeg
description: Combine the whiskey, rum, lemon and pineapple in a punch bowl and let stand for at least 3 hours (overnight is best). Dissolve the sugar in the water and stir into the whiskey mixture. Refrigerate for at least an hour before serving. To serve, slide the ice block into the bowl and grate about a quarter of a whole nutmeg over the top. Ladle out 3-ounce servings into punch cups. (This recipe makes about 24 servings).

name: Coastal Citrus & Basil
ingredients: Moon Mountain Coastal Citrus Flavored Vodka; Lemonade; Simple syrup; Fresh basil leaves
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon peel and/or basil sprig.

name: Hornitos Holiday Horchata
ingredients: Cinnamon; Sugar; Hornitos Plata Tequila; Coconut water; Almond milk
description: Coat the rim of a shot glass with cinnamon and sugar, and set aside. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into the prepared glass.

name: USS Richmond Punch
ingredients: Lemons; Superfine sugar; Strong-brewed black tea (use 2 teabags, 16 oz water); Dark Jamaican rum (Smith & Cross or Myers’s, 16 oz); VS or VSOP-grade Cognac (16 oz); Ruby port (Graham’s Six Grapes, 16 oz); Grand Marnier; Club soda or Champagne
description: Place a 2- or 3-quart bowl of water in the freezer and let freeze overnight. Peel 6 lemons with a swivel-bladed vegetable peeler, trying not to get any of the white pith. In bowl, muddle the peels with 1.5 cups of superfine sugar and let stand for an hour for the lemon oil to leach out. Juice the peeled lemons and add the juice to the sugar mixture, along with the tea. Strain out the peels and pour into a 1-gallon container. Add the rum, cognac, port and Grand Marnier, and refrigerate for at least 1 hour. To serve, unmold the block of ice into a 2-gallon punch bowl. Add the chilled punch stock and top off with the club soda (or, if feeling dangerous, Champagne). Garnish with grated numeg and 1 seeded lemon sliced thinly. Serves 20.

name: Super Sunday Punch Bowl of Freedom
ingredients: Cinnamon sticks; Whole cloves; Allspice; 100-proof Bottled in bond bourbon; Laird's Apple Brandy; Ruby red grapefruit juice; Honey; Sweet tea
description: Wrap the cinnamon sticks, cloves and allspice in cheesecloth, tie into a bundle and place in a punch bowl. Add the remaining ingredients and stir thoroughly. Fill with ice, stir and garnish with apple slices. (If assembling ahead of time, refrigerate after stirring together the ingredients and add the ice just before serving.).

name: Fashionable Manhattan
ingredients: Angostura bitters; Lime wedge; Lemon wedge; Orange wedge; Makers Mark Bourbon; Sweet vermouth
description: In a cocktail glass, lightly muddle the bitters, lime, lemon and orange. Remove the fruit remnants and discard. Add the bourbon and vermouth to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into the prepared glass. Run a bar spoon around the inside of the glass to incorporate the bitters and fruit oils. Garnish with a lightly crushed maraschino cherry.

name: Paloma Jimador
ingredients: El Jimador Reposado Tequila; Grapefruit soda; Fresh lime juice; Salt
description: Add all the ingredients to a tall glass and fill with ice.

name: Spiced Old Fashioned
ingredients: 2 tsp Maple syrup; 2 slices Fresno chile; 2 or 3 dashes Angostura Bitters; 2 oz Partida Añejo Tequila
description: In an Old Fashioned glass, muddle the maple syrup, chile and bitters. Add the tequila and fill with ice. Stir, and garnish with an orange twist and another slice of Fresno chile.

name: Antiguo Refresco
ingredients: Cucumber; Lime wedges; Antiguo Blanco Tequila; Agave nectar; Water
description: In a shaker, muddle the cucumber and lime wedges. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a cucumber slice and lime wedge.

name: Greyhound
ingredients: Vodka; Grapefruit juice
description: Add the vodka to a Collins glass filled with ice. Top with grapefruit juice and stir. Garnish with a lemon or lime wedge. (To make a Salty Dog, coat the rim of the glass with salt and leave out the garnish.).

name: Cosmo Rita
ingredients: Sauza Gold Tequila; Cranberry juice; DeKuyper Triple Sec; Fresh lime juice
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake for 11 seconds and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Partida Margarita
ingredients: Partida blanco tequila; Fresh lime juice; Agave syrup (one part agave nectar, one part water)
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled Margarita or cocktail glass, or an Old Fashioned glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Cosmopolitan
ingredients: Citrus vodka; Cointreau; Fresh lime juice; Cranberry juice
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Sangrita
ingredients: Lime juice; Orange juice; Grapefruit juice; Salt; Freshly ground black pepper; Tomato juice; Tabasco Sauce; Jalapeño pepper, halved (with seeds)
description: Add all the ingredients to a pitcher and stir until the salt dissolves. Let stand for 15 to 30 minutes and then remove and discard the jalapeño. (The longer the jalapeño infuses, the spicier the Sangrita will be.) Store in the refrigerator. Serve as an accompaniment to shots of tequila.

name: 1942 Martini
ingredients: Don Julio 1942 Tequila; Dry vermouth; Dash orange bitters
description: Add all the ingredient to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

name: Distrito Federal (AKA Tequila Manhattan)
ingredients: Reposado tequila; Sweet vermouth; Orange bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist or a cherry.

name: Herradura Tequila Mojito
ingredients: Mint leaves; Herradura Blanco Tequila; Herradura Blue Agave Nectar; Lime juice; Club soda
description: In a shaker, muddle the mint leaves. Add the tequila, lime juice and agave nectar, and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice. Top with club soda.

name: Tegroni
ingredients: Blanco tequila; Sweet vermouth; Campari
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice or a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a grapefruit twist.

name: Oaxacan Punch
ingredients: Amaro Averna; Sombra mezcal; Fresh grapefruit juice; Fresh lemon juice; Agave nectar; Ginger beer; Cold water
description: Add all the ingredients to a punch bowl and fill with ice. Garnish with grapefruit and lemon slices.

name: Dale’s Rainbow Planter’s Punch
ingredients: Myers's Dark Rum; Appleton White Rum; Orange curaçao; Fresh orange juice; Pineapple juice; Simple syrup; St. Elizabeth allspice dram; Fresh lime juice; Grenadine; Angostura bitters
description: Combine all the ingredients in a large pitcher or bowl. Before serving, shake individual drinks in a shaker with ice and strain into punch cups or large goblets filled three-quarters of the way with ice. Garnish each drink with pineapple, orange, and lime slices.

name: Spiced Chocolate
ingredients: Patrón XO Café Liqueur; Patrón Reposado Tequila; Dark chocolate liqueur; Fresh whipped cream
description: Add all the ingredients except the whipped cream to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled old fashioned glass. Layer the top of the cocktail with a dollop of whipped cream and garnish with a large pinch of crushed red pepper.

name: Sex on the Beach
ingredients: Vodka; Peach schnapps; Orange or pineapple juice; Cranberry juice; Chambord or crème de cassis (optional)
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with an orange wheel.

name: Screwdriver
ingredients: Vodka; Orange juice
description: Add the vodka to a highball glass filled with ice. Top with orange juice.

name: Cape Codder
ingredients: Vodka; Cranberry juice; Lime wedge
description: Add the vodka to a highball glass filled with ice. Top with cranberry juice and stir until chilled. Squeeze the lime wedge over the glass and drop it into the drink.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
ingredients: Vodka; Orange juice; Galliano L'Autentico
description: Add the vodka and the orange juice to a tall glass filled with ice. Stir, and float the Galliano on top. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Ketel One Vodka Martini
ingredients: Ketel One Vodka; Dry vermouth
description: Add both ingredients to a Martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or olives.

name: London Toddy
ingredients: Plymouth gin; Lemon juice; Cardamom Rock Candy Syrup%; Hot water; Angostura bitters; Peychauds Bitters
description: Combine all the ingredients in a pitcher and stir to combine. Garnish with whole star anise pods and thinly sliced lemon wheels. (This recipe makes 4 servings.).

name: Tom Collins
ingredients: Fresh lemon juice; Simple syrup (one part water, one part sugar); Gin; Club soda
description: Add the lemon juice, simple syrup and gin to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a highball or Collins glass filled with fresh ice. Top with club soda and garnish with a lemon wheel and a cherry.

name: Dutchman’s Daiquiri
ingredients: Bols genever; Red chile pepper, seeded and sliced; Lime juice; Rich sugar syrup (2 parts sugar, 1 part water)
description: In a shaker, muddle the chile. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake, and double-strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a red chile pepper.

name: Cucumber Fizz
ingredients: Cucumber, peeled and roughly chopped; Grey Goose La Poire flavored vodka; St-Germain elderflower liqueur; Lemon juice; Simple syrup; Lemonade or club soda
description: In a shaker, muddle the cucumber. Add the vodka, St-Germain, lemon juice and simple syrup, and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with mint, cucumber slices and lemon zest and top with lemonade or club soda.

name: Mango Brava Daiquiri
ingredients: Mango-Infused Rum; Lime juice; Simple syrup (one part sugar, one part water)
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Last Word
ingredients: Gin; Maraschino liqueur; Green Chartreuse; Fresh lime juice
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and double-strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Partida Paloma
ingredients: Partida blanco tequila; Salt; Half a lime; Grapefruit soda
description: Fill a highball glass with ice and add the tequila and salt. Squeeze the lime half into the glass and drop into the drink. Fill with grapefruit soda.

name: Strawberry Daiquiri
ingredients: Aged Puerto Rican or Jamaican rum; Fresh lime juice; Rich simple syrup*; Strawberry; Ice cubes
description: To make the Strawberry Daiquiri add all the ingredients to a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a Margarita glass or wine goblet. Garnish with an orchid and a cocktail umbrella.

name: Cucumber, Basil & Lime Gimlet
ingredients: Moon Mountain Vodka; Cucumber (.25 inches); Fresh basil leaves; Lemonade; Lime juice
description: In a shaker, muddle the basil and cucumber. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a lime wedge or cucumber wheel.

name: Tequila Mockingbird
ingredients: Jalapeño pepper slice; Patrón Silver Tequila; Watermelon-Basil Purée; Fresh lime juice; Agave syrup (one part agave nectar, one part water)
description: In a shaker, muddle the jalapeño slice. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake for 10 seconds and double strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.

name: Breakfast Margarita
ingredients: Partida blanco tequila; Fresh lime juice; Cointreau; Orange marmalade; Agave syrup (one part Partida agave nectar, one part water)
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Guadalajara Silver
ingredients: Sugar; Ground cinnamon; Don Roberto Tequila Plata; Agave nectar; Fresh lime juice; Fresh pink grapefruit juice; Ginger liqueur; Fresh Granny Smith apple juice
description: Mix equal amounts of sugar and cinnamon on a small plate and use to coat the rim of a rocks glass. Fill the glass with ice. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with Granny Smith apple slices.

name: Tequila Daisy
ingredients: Fresh lemon juice; Superfine sugar; Partida Reposado Tequila; Grand Marnier; Club soda
description: In a shaker, stir together the lemon juice and sugar. Add the tequila and Grand Marnier, and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Top with a small splash of club soda.

name: Caborita
ingredients: Salt; Cabo Wabo Reposado Tequila; Fresh lime juice; Agave nectar
description: Coat the rim of a large Margarita glass with salt. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Very Sexy Martini
ingredients: Raspberries; Mint leaves; Fresh lime juice; Simple syrup (one part sugar, one part water); Premium citrus vodka; Moët & Chandon Rosé Imperial Champagne
description: In a shaker, muddle the raspberries and mint. Add the remaining ingredients except the Champagne and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a Martini glass. Top with the Champagne and garnish with a mint spring and a raspberry.

name: Spicy Grand Margarita
ingredients: Salt; Simple syrup or agave nectar; Red pepper flakes; Chipotle chile powder; Reposado tequila; Grand Marnier; Fresh lime juice
description: Coat the rim of a rocks glass with salt, fill with ice and set aside. In a shaker, muddle the agave nectar or simple syrup, red pepper flakes and chile powder. Add the remaining ingredients, fill with ice and shake vigorously. Strain through a tea strainer into the prepared glass. Garnish with a jalapeño or red chile pepper.

name: The Basil Fizz
ingredients: Basil Haydens Bourbon; Champagne
description: Add Basil Hayden's Bourbon and Champagne to a flute.

name: White Lady
ingredients: Plymouth gin; Cointreau or Combier; Fresh lemon juice; Fresh egg white
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Moët Golden Glamour
ingredients: Moët & Chandon Imperial Champagne; Navan Vanilla Liqueur; Passion fruit juice
description: Add all the ingredients to a coupe glass. Garnish with a fresh mint sprig.

name: Champagne Cocktail
ingredients: Sugar cube; Angostura bitters; Champagne
description: Place the sugar cube on a spoon and douse with bitters. Drop into a Champagne flute and fill with Champagne. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Nick & Nora Dry Martini
ingredients: Beefeater gin; Noilly Prat dry vermouth
description: Add both the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a small Spanish olive without pimento.

name: 10 Cane Hemingway Daiquiri
ingredients: 10 Cane Rum; Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur; Fresh grapefruit juice; Fresh lime juice; Simple syrup
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and black cherry on a skewer.

name: Vesper
ingredients: Plymouth gin; Absolut vodka; Lillet Blanc
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a slice of lemon peel over the drink, rub along the rim of the glass and drop it in.

name: Gypsy Queen
ingredients: Russian Standard Vodka; Bénédictine; Angostura bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with cracked ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a swatch of thin-cut lemon peel over the top and discard.

name: Organic Moscow Mule
ingredients: Square One Organic vodka; Ginger beer; Juice of half a lime
description: Add all of the ingredients to a Moscow Mule mug (or highball glass) filled with ice, and garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Summer Martini
ingredients: Beefeater Summer Edition Gin; Dry vermouth
description: Add both ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir until well chilled and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a blackberry and a raspberry on a toothpick.

name: Gin Rickey
ingredients: Gin; Lime, cut in half; Club soda
description: Fill a highball glass with ice and add the gin or bourbon. Juice the lime halves into the glass and drop in the juiced lime shells. Fill with club soda.

name: French 75
ingredients: Gin; Fresh lemon juice; Simple syrup; Champagne
description: Add all the ingredients except the Champagne to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and fine-strain into a Champagne flute. Top with the Champagne and garnish with a long ribbon of lemon peel.

name: French Martini
ingredients: Vodka; Pineapple juice; Crème de cassis liqueur
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Ramos Gin Fizz
ingredients: Gin; Heavy cream; Fresh lemon juice; Fresh lime juice; Simple syrup; Orange flower water; Fresh egg white; Club soda
description: The secret to this drink is to shake, shake and shake some more. Add all the ingredients except the club soda to a shaker and shake vigorously without ice. Open the shaker, fill with ice and shake again. Strain into a Collins glass. Pour a little bit of club soda back and forth between the empty halves of the shaker to pick up any residual egg white, and then pour into the glass. (This will make for a frothier head.).

name: Hanky Panky
ingredients: Gin; Sweet vermouth; Fernet-Branca
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Marguerite
ingredients: Plymouth gin; Noilly Prat dry vermouth; Regans Orange Bitters No. 6
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon peel and/or a small Spanish olive without pimento.

name: Cannibal Corpse Reviver No. 2
ingredients: Perry's Tot Navy Strength Gin; Fresh lemon juice; Simple syrup (one part sugar, one part water); Pear brandy; Fernet-Branca; Prosecco
description: Add all the ingredients except the prosecco to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice. Top with chilled prosecco and garnish with a lemon half-wheel.

name: House-made Clover Club
ingredients: Gin (Tanqueray or Beefeater); Dry vermouth; Lemon juice; Raspberry jam; Egg white
description: Add all of the ingredients to a shaker with ice, shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Margaritas by the Pitcher
ingredients: Fresh lime juice; Cointreau; Agave syrup or simple syrup; Tequila
description: For this recipe you need a 52-ounce pitcher. First, add the fresh lime juice and then the Cointreau. Have a taste�-it should still be a bit tart. You can add a little more Cointreau but not much. Adjust the sweetness with a little agave syrup (two parts agave nectar, one part water) or simple syrup (one part sugar, one part water) but don't use more Cointreau, which would change the balance of the drink. Add the tequila and taste. The mixture should still be intense, because you haven't added any ice yet. When a guest wants a drink, pour 3 ounces of the mix into a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a stemmed Margarita or cocktail glass with a half-salted rim or a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a thin wheel of lime. If you have a large shaker or a gallon jar with a screw-top you can shake a whole bunch of drinks at the same time.

name: St-Rita
ingredients: Salt (optional); Tequila; St-Germain; Lime
description: If desired, coat the rim of a rocks or Collins glass with salt and fill with ice. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and fine strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Lagerita
ingredients: Salt (optional); Cabeza Tequila; Cointreau; Lime juice; Modelo Especial Beer
description: If desired, coat the rim of a highball glass with salt, fill with ice and set aside. Add the tequila, Cointreau and lime juice to a shaker and fill with fresh ice. Shake, and strain into the prepared glass. Top with the beer and garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Gibson
ingredients: Gin (or vodka); Dry vermouth
description: Add both ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a whole cocktail onion.

name: 50/50 Martini
ingredients: Plymouth gin; Dry vermouth; Orange bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Strawberry Basil Margarita
ingredients: Medium strawberries; Basil leaves; Lime juice; Simple syrup; Jose Cuervo Tradicional Tequila; Cointreau; Maraschino liqueur
description: In a shaker, muddle the strawberries, basil, lime juice and simple syrup. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a Margarita glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a lime wheel and additional basil leaf.

name: Dirty Martini
ingredients: Gin or vodka; Dry vermouth; Olive brine
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with 2 olives.

name: Black Widow
ingredients: Blackberries; Basil leaves; Don Julio blanco tequila; Fresh lime juice; Agave nectar
description: In a shaker, muddle the blackberries and basil. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a stemless Martini glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a blackberry and basil leaf on a toothpick.

name: Gin Buck
ingredients: Gin; Juice of half a lemon or lime; Ginger ale
description: Fill a Collins glass with ice and add the gin and lemon or lime juice. Fill with ginger ale and stir briefly. Garnish with a lemon or lime wedge.

name: Negroni
ingredients: Campari; Gin (Beefeater or Tanqueray); Sweet vermouth (Martini & Rossi Rosso or Cinzano Rosso)
description: Add all of the ingredients to an Old Fashioned glass and fill with ice. Stir until cold, and garnish with an orange half-wheel.

name: Aviation
ingredients: Gin; Maraschino liqueur; Crème de violette or Crème Yvette; Lemon juice
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry if desired.

name: South Side
ingredients: No. 3 gin; Mint leaves; Simple syrup; Fresh lemon juice
description: In a shaker, muddle the mint and simple syrup. Add the lemon juice and gin, and fill with ice. Shake, and double-strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Gin Fizz
ingredients: Club soda; Plymouth gin; Lemon juice; Simple syrup; Egg white (about .5 oz)
description: Add the club soda to a Fizz or Collins glass and set aside. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and shake without ice for about 10 seconds. Add 3 or 4 ice cubes and shake very well. Double-strain into the prepared glass.

name: The Improved Holland Gin Cock-Tail
ingredients: Bols genever; Rich simple syrup (2 parts sugar, 1 part water); Angostura bitters; Dry Orange Curaçao; Absinthe
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with large, hard, cold ice cubes. Stir, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.

name: Bloody Bulldog
ingredients: Bulldog GIn; Tomato juice; Lemon juice; Garlic clove, minced; Prepared horseradish; Balsamic vinegar; Worcestershire sauce; Celery salt; Black pepper; Tabasco Sauce
description: Add all the ingredients to a highball glass, fill with ice and stir. Garnish with any of the following: a celery stalk, pickled okra, a dill pickle spear, an asparagus spear, a skewer with 3 olives, a skewer with 3 cherry tomatoes or a carrot stick.

name: Dry Martini
ingredients: Beefeater gin; Dry vermouth; Orange bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir until very cold and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Margarita
ingredients: Fresh squeezed lime juice; Cointreau, triple sec or another orange liqueur; Blanco tequila; Kosher salt (optional)
description: Add the ingredients to a shaker filled with ice and shake. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass or rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a lime wheel. For a slightly sweeter drink, add a dash of agave syrup (one part water, two parts agave nectar) before shaking.

name: Gimlet
ingredients: Gin; Lime juice; Simple syrup
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass or an Old Fashioned glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a lime wheel.  (You can substitute 1 oz lime cordial, such as Rose's Lime Juice, for both the lime juice and simple syrup).

name: Grey Goose Mediterranean Mary
ingredients: Lemon wedge; Coarse salt; Grey Goose Vodka (Original or Le Citron); Dry sherry; Mediterranean Mary Mix
description: Rub the lemon wedge on the outer edge of a tall glass and then roll the glass lip in the salt. Add the remaining ingredients to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a cucumber spear and an olive.

name: Bloody Caesar
ingredients: Celery salt; Vodka; Clamato juice; Worcestershire sauce; Tabasco sauce; Prepared horseradish, to taste (optional)
description: Coat the rim of a tall glass with celery salt, fill with ice and set aside. Add the remaining ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Pour back and forth into another mixing glass a few times to mix. Strain into the prepared glass and garnish with a celery stalk.

name: Bloody Kirby
ingredients: Grey Goose Le Citron Flavored Vodka; Kirby cucumber slice, peeled; Tabasco Sauce; Dry vermouth; Tomato juice
description: In a shaker, muddle the vodka, cucumber, Tabasco and vermouth. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Top with the tomato juice and garnish with a Kirby cucumber spear.

name: Bayou Bloody Mary
ingredients: Vodka; Tomato juice; Tabasco Sauce; Worcestershire sauce; Prepared horseradish; Celery salt; Ground black pepper; Lemon juice
description: Add all the ingredients to a pint glass and fill with ice. Stir, and garnish with four spiced pickled string beans, two olives and four crawfish tails.

name: Grey Goose Le Citron Asian Mary
ingredients: Grey Goose Le Citron Flavored Vodka; Sake; Asian Mary Mix*
description: Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a large tumbler filled with fresh ice. Garnish with shiso or cilantro leaves and a lemon wheel.

name: Kamikaze
ingredients: Vodka; Triple sec; Lime juice
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass or divide between two shot glasses.

name: Classic Bloody Mary
ingredients: Lemon wedge; Lime wedge; Premium Vodka; Tomato juice; Tabasco Sauce; Prepared horseradish; Worcestershire sauce; Celery salt; Ground black pepper; smoked paprika
description: Pour some celery salt onto a small plate. Rub the juicy side of the lemon or lime wedge along the lip of a pint glass. Roll the outer edge of the glass in celery salt until fully coated. Fill with ice and set aside. Squeeze the lemon and lime wedges into a shaker and drop them in. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake gently and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a celery stalk and a lime wedge.

name: Snap, Crackle, Drop
ingredients: Don Julio Reposado Tequila; Angostura bitters; Freshly ground black pepper; Lime wedge
description: Pour the tequila into a shot glass. Stir together the bitters and pepper on a saucer until they form a paste and coat one side of the lime wedge with the mixture. Take a bite of the lime and then sip the spirit.

name: B-52
ingredients: Kahlúa liqueur; Baileys Irish cream liqueur; Grand Marnier liqueur
description: Layer the three spirits in a shot glass in the order that they're listed.

name: Master Cleanse
ingredients: Pisco; Fresh lemon juice; Grade-A maple syrup; Ground cayenne pepper; Chili powder
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker with ice and shake. Strain into 2 small tumblers or 2 large shot glasses.

name: Hornitos Tequila Toddy
ingredients: Hornitos Plata Tequila; Honey; Agave nectar; Lemon wedge; Cinnamon stick; Cloves; Hot water
description: Add all the ingredients to a mug. Stir, and let steep for one minute.

name: Baileys Peppermint Cream
ingredients: Baileys with a Hint of Mint Chocolate; Hot chocolate; Fresh whipped cream; Candy canes, crushed
description: Pour the Baileys and hot chocolate into a coffee mug. Top with a dollop of whipped cream and sprinkle crushed candy cane on top. Garnish with a mint leaf.

name: Lords-a-Leaping
ingredients: The Macallan Fine Oak 10-year-old single-malt scotch; St. Elizabeth allspice dram; Angostura bitters; Fresh lime juice; Honey syrup (1 part honey, 1 part water)
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg and a Barker & Mills Bourbon Vanilla Cocktail Cherry.

name: Chocolate Cheer
ingredients: Don Julio 1942 Tequila; Chocolate milk; Agave nectar; Cognac; Ground nutmeg
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Trick Nog
ingredients: Wild Turkey 81 Bourbon; Orange juice; Cream; Brown sugar syrup; Whole egg; Cherry Heering
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into two punch cups. Grate cinnamon on top and garnish with a slice of orange peel and a cinnamon stick.

name: Beggar's Banquet
ingredients: Angostura bitters; Fresh lemon juice; Maple syrup; Makers Mark Bourbon; Old Speckled Hen Beer
description: Add all the ingredients, except the beer, to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with beer and garnish with an orange half-wheel.

name: McKinley’s Delight
ingredients: Straight rye whiskey; Italian red vermouth; Cherry liqueur; Absinthe
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Cut a thin swatch of lemon peel, twist over the drink and discard.

name: Lincoln Club Cooler
ingredients: Cruzan Rum; Ginger ale
description: Add the rum and ginger ale to a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Cooperstown Cocktail
ingredients: Tanqueray gin; Martini & Rossi Rosso Vermouth; Noilly Prat Original Dry Vermouth; The Bitter Truth Orange Bitters; Mint leaves
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake gently and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mudslide
ingredients: Vodka; Kahlua; Baileys Irish cream; Milk or cream; Ice
description: Add all the ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth. Pour the Mudslide into a Martini or Hurricane glass. If desired, drizzle with chocolate syrup.

name: Moscow Mule
ingredients: Vodka; Ginger beer; Juice from half a lime
description: Add all the ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Americano
ingredients: Campari; Sweet vermouth; Club soda
description: Pour the Campari and vermouth into a rocks or highball glass filled with ice. Add a splash of club soda and garnish with an orange twist.

name: Red, White and Night
ingredients: Cabernet sauvignon wine; Vodka; Simple syrup; Freshly squeezed lemon juice
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strin into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with 3 blueberries or black raspberries coated in powdered sugar.

name: Tazza di Vita
ingredients: Chopped cucumber; Mint sprigs; Simple syrup; Averna amaro; Death's Door Gin; Fresh lime juice; Club soda
description: In a shaker, muddle the mint, cucumber and simple syrup. Add the Averna, gin and lime juice, and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a tall glass filled with fresh ice. Top with club soda and garnish with a mint sprig and cucumber wheel.

name: Michelada
ingredients: Salt; Cayenne pepper; Lime juice; Tabasco Sauce; Worcestershire sauce; Ground black pepper; Celery salt; Mexican lager beer (such as Tecate, chilled)
description: Rub the lime wedge along half the rim of the pint glass and dip into a mix of equal parts salt and cayenne pepper. Add the remaining ingredients except the beer. Fill with beer and garnish with a fresh lime wedge.

name: Dark ’n Stormy
ingredients: Gosling's Black Seal rum; Stormy ginger beer, to top
description: Fill a tall glass with ice, and add the rum. Top with the ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Absolut Boston Home Run
ingredients: Absolut Boston Vodka; White grape juice; Ginger ale
description: Add ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Francophile
ingredients: Calvados; Rioja wine; Cinnamon Syrup; Lemon juice; Water
description: Add all the ingredients to a small saucepan. Cook over medium heat until hot. Pour into a thick-walled mug and garnish with an apple slice and a cinnamon stick.

name: Milk & Honey
ingredients: Bénédictine; Milk
description: Add the Bénédictine to a mug. Fill with ice, top with cold milk and garnish with an orange slice and a cinnamon stick. This cocktail can also be served hot. Simply �-warm up the milk and leave out the ice.).

name: Heated Affair
ingredients: Partida Añejo Tequila; Hot Spiced Apple Cider*; Heavy cream
description: Add the tequila and cider to a pre-warmed Irish Coffee glass. Float a little heavy cream on top and garnish with freshly grated nutmeg and a cinnamon stick.

name: Clover Club
ingredients: Gin; Egg white; Fresh lemon juice; Raspberry syrup*; Speared raspberries, for garnish
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with three speared raspberries. * If you don�''t have raspberry syrup, you can muddle together 3 or 4 fresh raspberries and .5 oz simple syrup (one part sugar, one part water) instead.

name: Last-Minute Mulled Wine
ingredients: Fruity red wine (such as Beaujolais or syrah); Bourbon or brandy; Star anise pods; Long strip of lemon or orange peel; Sugar
description: Add all of the ingredients to a small saucepan. Cook over low heat until warm (do not boil), remove from the heat and let stand for 5 to 10 minutes. Serve in mugs or punch cups, garnished with cinnamon sticks.

name: Glögg
ingredients: Red wine; Port; Vodka; Dried figs, sliced; Raisins; Oranges (peeled and juiced); Light brown sugar; Star anise pods; Long peppers; Cloves; Cardamom pods; Cinnamon sticks
description: Add all the ingredients to a large saucepan over medium heat. Heat to a simmer, remove from the heat and let stand for 2 hours. Strain, and reheat. Serve in mugs, garnished with raisins and sliced blanched almonds.

name: Autumn Wassail
ingredients: Louis Royer Force 53° VSOP cognac; Santa Teresa 1796 Rum; Wassail, hot (or 3 oz wassail, chilled, if serving cold)
description: To serve hot, add the cognac and rum to a Toddy glass and top with the wassail. Garnish with apple slices or fresh cranberries. To serve cold, add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Whisky Skin
ingredients: Boiling water; Demerara sugar; Lemon peel; Scotch (Macallan or Ardbeg)
description: Rinse a mug or heatproof cup with boiling water to warm it. Add the sugar and a swatch of thin-cut lemon peel. Add 1 oz boiling water and stir to dissolve the sugar. Add the Scotch (see Other information for recommended brands). Finish by adding 1 oz more of boiling water to bring the heat back up.

name: Apple Toddy
ingredients: Boiling water; baked Macintosh apple; Sugar (heaping tsp); Bonded applejack (Laird’s),  cognac or bourbon
description: Fortunately, the labor-intensive part of this drink lies solely in baking the apples. Take half as many Macintosh apples as you'd like to make drinks, core them, peel them and wrap them in wet parchment paper. Bake them in a 350-degree oven for 30 to 45 minutes until completely soft. Set aside until cool. For each drink, warm a heatproof mug by rinsing it with boiling water. Put in half a baked apple and a heaping teaspoon of sugar and muddle them quickly together. Add 1 ounce of boiling water and stir. Add the applejack, cognac or bourbon and stir again. Add 1 ounce of boiling water. (The staggered addition of the water keeps the drink as hot as possible). Grate nutmeg over the top and serve.

name: Old Fashioned
ingredients: George Dickel No. 12 Tennessee Whisky (or any American Whiskey); White sugar; Angostura bitters; Regans' Orange Bitters No. 6; Cold water; Brown sugar cube
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass. Muddle to break down the sugar and stir briefly. Fill with ice, stir again and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Twist slices of lemon and orange peel over the drink and drop them in.

name: Zacapa Hot Toddy
ingredients: Boiling water; Zacapa 23 Rum; Clover honey; Fresh lemon juice
description: Pour the water into a footed Irish coffee mug. Add the remaining ingredients to a cocktail shaker. Shake well, pour into the mug and stir. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Hot Buttered Rum
ingredients: Gold rum; Hot buttered rum batter; Boiling water
description: Add the rum and batter to a mug. Fill with boiling water and stir.

name: Drambuie Rusty Nail
ingredients: Drambuie; Dewars White Label Scotch whisky
description: Add the ingredients to a rocks glass filled with ice and stir.

name: Boulevardier
ingredients: Campari; Sweet vermouth; Bulleit Rye Whiskey
description: Add all the ingredients to a rocks glass filled with ice and stir to combine. Garnish with an orange twist. To serve the drink up, add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: The Dead Rabbit Irish Coffee
ingredients: Demerara syrup (one part Demerara sugar, one part water); Clontarf Irish whiskey; Brewed coffee, hot; Heavy cream, lightly whipped
description: Fill an Irish Coffee glass with hot water and let stand for a few minutes to warm. Pour out the water and add the Demerara syrup, whiskey and coffee. Stir to combine and top with a layer of heavy cream the width of your thumb. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.

name: The Hornitos Hot Shotty
ingredients: Hornitos Añejo Tequila; Hot chocolate
description: Add the tequila and hot chocolate to a half-pint glass. Garnish with a dollop of whipped cream and a dash of chili powder.

name: Grand Coffee
ingredients: Grand Marnier, warmed; Hot brewed coffee; Brown sugar syrup, if desired
description: Pour all the ingredients into a mug or heat-proof highball glass and stir. Spoon about 2 tbsp of whipped cream on top.

name: Sazerac
ingredients: Absinthe; Sugar cube; Peychaud's bitters; Angostura bitters; Russell's Reserve rye whiskey
description: Rinse a chilled rocks glass with absinthe, discarding any excess, and set aside. In a mixing glass, muddle the sugar cube and both bitters. Add the rye, fill with ice and stir. Strain into the prepared glass. Twist a slice of lemon peel over the surface to extract the oils and then discard.

name: Manhattan
ingredients: Rye whiskey; Sweet vermouth; Angostura bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass filled with ice and stir. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and garnish with a cherry.

name: Blood & Sand
ingredients: The Glenrothes Select Reserve single-malt Scotch whisky; Sweet vermouth; Heering cherry liqueur; Orange juice, freshly squeezed
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled coupe or cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

name: Vieux Carré
ingredients: Dale DeGroff's Pimento Aromatic Bitters; Bénédictine; Sweet vermouth; Cognac; George Dickel Rye Whiskey
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Rob Roy
ingredients: Scotch whisky; Sweet vermouth; Angostura bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Singapore Raffles Sling
ingredients: Bombay Sapphire gin; Bénédictine liqueur; Cherry brandy; Club soda
description: Pour the gin, Bénédictine and cherry brandy into a sling or highball glass. Fill with ice and top with club soda. Squeeze a lime wedge over the drink, drop it into the glass and stir. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Paloma
ingredients: Casa Noble Crystal Tequila; Lime juice; Grapefruit soda
description: Add the tequila and lime juice to a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with grapefruit soda and stir briefly.

name: Mimosa
ingredients: Orange juice; Sparkling wine, chilled
description: Add the orange juice to a Champagne flute. Fill with sparkling wine.

name: Hurricane
ingredients: White rum; Dark rum; Lime juice; Orange juice; Passion fruit juice; Simple syrup; Grenadine
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a large Hurricane glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with an orange half-wheel and a cherry.

name: Mojito
ingredients: Mint leaves; Simple syrup; Fresh lime juice; White rum; Club soda
description: In a shaker, lightly muddle the mint. Add the simple syrup, lime juice and rum, and fill with ice. Shake well and pour (unstrained) into a highball glass. Top with the club soda and garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Strawberry Cucumber Caipirinha
ingredients: Lemon; English cucumber; Strawberries; Sugar; Leblon Cachaça
description: In a shaker, muddle the lemon, cucumber, strawberries and sugar. Fill with ice and add the cachaça. Shake, and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with strawberry and cucumber slices.

name: Rum Rangoon
ingredients: Banks 5-Island rum; Fresh lime juice; Clément Créole Shrubb Rum; Martinique sugar cane syrup; Angostura bitters; Angostura Orange Bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled coupe or cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange wedge.

name: Traditional Mai Tai
ingredients: Fresh lime juice; Rock candy syrup (2 parts sugar, 1 part water); Orgeat almond syrup; Orange curaçao; Premium aged rum (Appleton Estate 12-Year-Old, El Dorado 12- Year-Old)
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with crushed ice. Shake vigorously until the shaker is well-chilled and frosty on the outside. Pour (unstrained) into a double Old Fashioned glass. Garnish with half of a juiced lime and a fresh mint sprig.

name: Beachbum’s Own
ingredients: Licor 43; Unsweetened pineapple juice; Orange juice; Fresh lemon juice; Passion fruit puree; Demerara rum (El Dorado or Lemon Hart); Light Virgin Islands rum (Cruzan)
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with crushed ice. Shake, and pour (unstrained) into a Tiki mug or a double Old Fashioned glass.

name: Bermuda Rum Swizzle
ingredients: Gosling's Black Seal rum; Gosling's Gold rum; Pineapple juice; Orange juice; Grenadine; Angostura bitters
description: Fill a pitcher a third of the way with crushed ice, and add all the ingredients. Churn vigorously until frothing (or shake in a large shaker), and strain into 4 rocks glasses filled with fresh ice. Garnish each with an orange slice, a pineapple cube and a cherry.

name: Daiquiri
ingredients: Dark rum (Appleton Estate Reserve); Fresh lime juice; Simple syrup
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Jamaican Breeze
ingredients: Fresh ginger; Appleton Estate Reserve Rum; Pineapple juice; Simple syrup; Angostura bitters
description: In a shaker, muddle the ginger. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Painkiller
ingredients: Pusser's rum; Pineapple juice; Orange juice; Cream of coconut
description: Add all of the ingredients into a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a hurricane glass or snifter filled with crushed ice. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg and a pineapple wedge.

name: Pink Plymouth Gin & Tonic
ingredients: Plymouth gin; Angostura bitters; Lime juice; Fentimans Tonic Water
description: Add the gin, bitters and lime juice to a tall glass filled with ice. Top with tonic water and stir briefly.

name: One-Two Punch
ingredients: Johnnie Walker Double Black Scotch Whisky; Lemon juice; Grapefruit juice; Citrus Oleo-Saccharum; Victory Prima Pils Pilsner; Grapefruit half-wheel
description: Add all the ingredients except the pilsner to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a pilsner glass filled with fresh ice. Top with the pilsner and garnish with a pinch of La Boîte Borneo N. 26 Spice Mix and a grapefruit half-wheel.

name: Forbidden Apple
ingredients: Angostura bitters; Grand Marnier; Calvados; Champagne
description: Add the first three ingredients to a Champagne flute and top with the Champagne. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Eggnog
ingredients: Eggs, separated; Sugar, divided; Whole milk; Heavy cream; Bourbon; Spiced rum
description: In a large bowl, beat together the egg yolks and half a cup of sugar until they turn light in color. Stir in the milk, heavy cream, bourbon and rum. In a separate bowl, beat the egg whites with the remaining quarter-cup of sugar until they form soft peaks. Fold about a third of the egg whites into the yolk mixture. Serve in punch or tea cups topped with freshly grated nutmeg, folding in more of the egg whites as desired.

name: Guava Rose
ingredients: Leblon Cachaça; Guava puree; Rose syrup; Lime juice; Ice
description: Add all the ingredients to a blender and blend for about 30 seconds. Serve in a coupe glass. Garnish with a rose petal.

name: French 75
ingredients: Lemon juice; Simple syrup; Gin; Champagne
description: Add all the ingredients except the Champagne to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a Champagne flute. Top with the Champagne and garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Hellfire
ingredients: Lime; Sailor Jerry Spiced Rum; Tabasco Sauce; Ginger beer; Pilsner
description: Squeeze the lime into a pint glass. Fill with ice and add the rum, Tabasco and ginger beer. Top with beer.

name: Euro
ingredients: Michael Collins Blended Irish Whiskey; Dry Dolin Vermouth de Chambéry; Amontillado sherry; Grand Marnier
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a piece of lemon peel.

name: Set the New Year on Fire
ingredients: Lime juice; Simple syrup; Mint leaves; Bowmore 12 Years Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky; Campari
description: Add the lime juice, cane syrup, and mint leaves to a Collins glass and press gently with a muddler. Add the Scotch and fill with crushed ice. Float the Campari on top and fill with more crushed ice. Garnish with a flaming lime shell.

name: Holiday “Sauce”
ingredients: Cinnamon; Sugar; Hennessy V.S. cognac; Fresh lemon juice; Cranberry sauce (heaping tsp); Fee Brothers cranberry bitters
description: Coat the rim of a Martini or coupe glass with a mixture of equal parts cinnamon and sugar, and set aside. Add the remaining ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Hearn
ingredients: Knappogue Castle 12 Year Old Single Malt Irish Whiskey; Dolin Rouge vermouth; Green Chartreuse; The Dead Rabbit Orinoco Bitters; Absinthe; Orange bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a slice of orange peel over the drink to release the oils and discard the peel.

name: Raspberry Caipirinha
ingredients: Superfine sugar; Raspberries; Lime, cut into wedges; Leblon Cachaça
description: In a shaker, muddle the sugar, raspberries and lime. Add the cachaça and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and pour (unstrained) into a rocks glass. Garnish with an additional raspberry.

name: New Year’s Sparkler
ingredients: Berry-flavored vodka; Pomegranate juice; Champagne
description: Add the vodka and cranberry juice to a chilled Champagne flute. Top with Champagne and garnish with 5-6 raspberries on a long skewer.

name: Piña Colada
ingredients: Light or gold rum; Coconut milk; Fresh pineapple juice
description: To make the Piña Colada add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a Hurricane glass filled with fresh ice. (You may also blend all the ingredients with crushed ice instead.) Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple wedge.

name: Spazerac
ingredients: Rye whiskey; Simple syrup; Absinthe; Lemon juice; Peychaud's bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to a blender with just under 1 cup of ice. Blend until smooth and pour into an Old Fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Gaelic Flip
ingredients: Bushmills Irish Whiskey; Sweet vermouth; Allspice liqueur; Simple syrup; Egg
description: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and dry shake (without ice) to emulsify. Fill with ice and shake again. Strain into an Irish coffee mug or rocks glass and garnish with grated nutmeg.

name: Tasman Sea
ingredients: 1 oz Fresh lime juice; .75 oz Fresh lemon juice; .25 oz Orange Curaçao; 1 oz Demerara syrup (one part Demerara sugar, one part water); 1 oz 151-proof gold Caribbean rum (Cruzan or Bacardi); .5 oz Lemon Hart 151-Proof Demerara Rum; 10 oz Crushed ice
description: Add all the ingredients to a blender. Blend until smooth, up to 10 seconds. Pour (unstrained) into a large snifter or tiki vessel.

name: Dubonnet and Champagne
ingredients: Dubonnet Rouge; Champagne
description: Add both ingredients to a Champagne flute. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Champagne Dreams
ingredients: Pama Pomegranate liqueur; Orange liqueur; Fresh orange juice; Champagne
description: Add all the ingredients except the Champagne to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled Champagne flute. Top with the Champagne and garnish with an orange twist.

name: The Lanesborough
ingredients: Grand Marnier; Cranberry juice; Passion fruit juice or puree; Moët & Chandon Champagne
description: Add the Grand Marnier, cranberry juice and passion fruit juice or puree to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled Champagne flute. Top with the Champagne and garnish with an orange spiral twist.

name: Champagne Cobbler
ingredients: Orange juice; Pineapple juice; Maraschino liqueur; Champagne
description: Add the orange juice, pineapple juice and maraschino liqueur to a mixing glass and stir to combine. Add the Champagne and fill with ice. Stir again gently and strain into a Champagne flute. Garnish with a lemon peel.

name: Baileys Velvet Mocha
ingredients: Baileys; Hot chocolate; Fresh whipped cream
description: Pour the Baileys and hot chocolate into a coffee mug. Top with a dollop of whipped cream. Garnish with 3 coffee beans.

name: French 65
ingredients: Cointreau; Angostura bitters; Piper-Heidsieck
description: Add the Cointreau and bitters to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled Champagne flute. Top with the Champagne and garnish with an orange twist.
